descriptions.description: LZO is a portable lossless data compression library

set.commands:
PACKAGE_NAME=lzo PACKAGE_VERSION=2.06
oegextract ${PACKAGE_NAME}-${PACKAGE_VERSION}.tar.gz
oeg_include_files AUTHORS COPYING README THANKS
configure --prefix=${OEG_BASE_DIR} --with-gnu-ld --enable-shared --bindir=${OEG_BASE_BIN_DIR} --libdir=${OEG_BASE_LIB_DIR} ${CONFIGURE_HOST_PARA} make #make check #make test make install-strip DESTDIR=${OEG_INSTALL_DIR}
cd "${OEG_INSTALL_DIR}${OEG_BASE_DIR}" oeg_fix_path_names
# missed shared library, here is one. but what was the reason? TODO mkdir -p ..${OEG_BASE_BIN_DIR} gcc -shared -o ..${OEG_BASE_BIN_DIR}/liblzo2-2.dll -Wl,--out-implib,../${OEG_BASE_LIB_DIR}/liblzo2.dll.a -Wl,--whole-archive ..${OEG_BASE_LIB_DIR}/liblzo2.a -Wl,--no-whole-archive -L/mingw/lib -lwinmm
oeg_fix_libtool_file liblzo2.la liblzo2-2.dll liblzo2.dll.a liblzo2.a oegarchive ${PACKAGE_NAME}-${PACKAGE_VERSION}
